abstract: Ninety percent of Merrill Lynch brokers who were offered bonuses to stay on with Bank of America had signed up for them as of late Thursday, The Wall Street Journal reported, citing people familiar with the firm.
lead_paragraph: Ninety percent of Merrill Lynch brokers who were offered bonuses to stay on with Bank of America had signed up for them as of late Thursday, The Wall Street Journal reported, citing people familiar with the firm.

headline.main: Most Merrill Brokers Accept BofA Bonus, Report Says

abstract: Bank of America is likely to raise its stake in China Construction Bank soon, paying about 2.46 yuan ($0.36) a share, or 1.2 times the Chinese lender’s book value, Caijing magazine reported, citing unidentified sources.
lead_paragraph: Bank of America is likely to raise its stake in China Construction Bank soon, paying about 2.46 yuan ($0.36) a share, or 1.2 times the Chinese lender’s book value, Caijing magazine reported, citing unidentified sources.

headline.main: Bank of America May Raise Stake in Chinese Bank, Report Says
